title: List of Reasons Why Gunpowder Treason Should Be Forgot
summary:
Key ideas
- Guy Fawkes Day historically used as an excuse for anti-Catholic bigotry.
- King James I was inclined towards witch-burning and exterminating minorities.
- George Washington condemn the celebration of Guy Fawkes Day.
- Guy Fawkes Day became associated with people from 4chan.

Key learnings
- Guy Fawkes Day has a controversial history.
- The association of Guy Fawkes with anti-establishment movements may not have a solid basis.

Key questions
- Did people think about the reasons behind Guy Fawkes Day before using it for their purposes?
- Should Guy Fawkes Day continue to be celebrated given its historical context?
